instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3330: What is 820-3330? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPVCORE_GPU: What is PPVCORE_GPU? This is the main power rail for the GPU. This is required for the GPU to turn on so you can get image on the display. .
definitions.U8900: What is U8900? This chip creates the GPU power rails on the 820-3332 board to the 2012 and early 2013 15‚Äù Retina Macbook Pros. It becomes desoldered and is the cause of no video and kernel panics/crashes in that model most of the time..
definitions.GPUVCORE_EN: What is GPUVCORE_EN? GPUVCORE_EN enables GPU VCORE when it is high, a power rail necessary for the GPU to function so you can get an image on the screen. Signals with _EN on the end enable whatever came before the _EN if the signal is high. .

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> chime boot to black screen.
threads.message:
This board no liquid damaged. 
Boot & chime to black screen. no backlight no video.

Tried with known working screen, no luck.

<SIGNAL>PPVCORE_GPU</SIGNAL> 0V. <SIGNAL>P1V5_GPU_S0</SIGNAL> 0V.
 Appreciate your advice.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> chime boot to black screen.
threads.message:
No reason to check another screen, if no GPU voltages present.
Try to resolder <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> with leaded solder.

You can consider disabling GPU, if result to be faulty.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> chime boot to black screen.
threads.message:
Hi thank you for advice. 
Resolder <CHIP>U8900</CHIP> still no video . issue is <SIGNAL>GPUVCORE_EN</SIGNAL> on on pin 38 not present.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3330</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> chime boot to black screen.
threads.message: Check GPU power sequence at page 92.
